conversations.content: VROOM VROOOOOM!
Yo, this castle is HUGE! Strongest-lookin' I've ever seen!
But we're still stronger. Come on, Chariot, let's show 'em what's what!
The hell? Is he tryin' to fight the castle itself?
It seems less like fighting and more like... riding around in circles.
This castle won't know which way is up once I'M through with it!
We got a weirdo on our hands, boss.
Let's just hear what he has to say.
Excuse me, can we talk for a—
Shove off, ya turkey! I ain't slowin' down for no one!
Wah! He's so fast!
Can't speak to his brains, but he sure ain't short'a energy. Kid's like a damn tornado!
But playtime's over. HAAAH!
What the—?! He stopped me dead!
We got some questions fer ya, kiddo.
Holy cow... You're MASSIVE! I didn't know muscles could GET that big!
You gotta be the king of this castle. Right?
Bwaaa ha ha! Sorry kid, ya got the wrong guy. The boss is Euden over there.
THAT pipsqueak? Please. Nobody's takin' orders from him!
Come on, a castle this big's gotta have a real giant of a leader!
Heh. You're not the first to tell me I don't look the part of royalty.
You really came here without knowin' about Euden? There's rare for ya.
Well yeah. I saw this castle from a ways off, so I just hopped on my chariot and rolled on over.
Yer what now?
My chariot, man! We ride together, always. Check out all the spikes and junk—pretty keen, huh?
I'm tellin' ya, when me and my guy here link up, there's no stoppin' us!
And there he goes again.
Whaddya think, boss? Should we drive him off?
No, he doesn't seem to be an enemy.
Let's just leave him be for now. He'll tire himself out eventually.
All right, but I ain't carrying him to bed...
Time for some night ridin'. Gotta love that evening air!
WOOOOOOOOO!
...Kinda seems like he's just gettin' MORE energy.
Yeah. It's actually kind of impressive.
Euden, would you please do something about that racket?
Holy—is that a REAL dragon?!
Thing's frickin' HUGE!
Guess seein' ol' Mids stopped him in his tracks.
If he's interested in dragons, we may have just found our solution.
Midgardsormr, would you mind talking to him for a while?
Hold up, this cat orders dragons around?!
Very well. I happen to have a few words in mind already.
Thanks. Don't be too hard on him.
I can't believe what I'm seein' right now.
This guy leads dragons. Frickin' DRAGONS!
...Huh?
He might not have big muscles, but he's definitely king material.
Hey, sorry about callin' you pipsqueak before, Slick. I was way off base.
Er... ＂Slick＂?
Yeah! That's what I'm callin' you from now on, Slick. Now tell me how you whipped that dragon into shape!
W-well, I did defeat him to form our pact, but that's—
Ha ha, hell yeah you did! Clocked him clean in the kisser, I bet.
That's the kinda strength I'm after! You GOTTA tell me how you do it.
Um... I guess I just train hard each day. Oh, and I always eat my vegetables.
Whoa... That's hardcore, Slick!
All right, that clinches it. Lemme join your gang!
Er, you're welcome to join our cause, but I don't think we're a ＂gang＂ in the way you're thinking.
Whatever you say, Slick! I'm yours to command from here on out.
Why do I get the feeling he has no idea what we do here?
Oh, no doubt there. Still, it sounds like he's gonna heed yer beck and call, so at least we can keep him on a leash.
Problem solved, if ya ask me.
No. One serious problem remains.
What's that?
I will not abide anyone thinking you ＂whipped me into shape.＂
You will set him straight. Are we clear, Euden?
Yo, he's givin' you lip, Slick! Want me to whack him?
Bwa ha ha! Yer just rarin' to go, huh?
Looks like ya got yer work cut out for ya, boss.
*sigh* I'm afraid so...
Aw yeah, this is SPEED!
He never slows down, does he?
Yeah, and he never stops makin' noise, either. He's bad enough without that damn chariot, but put the two together and ya got a recipe fer insomnia.
I say we split 'em up.
That might prove difficult. He seems rather attached to it.
Yo, Slick!
What's the haps?
We were just discussing your chariot, actually.
Hell yeah you were! Ain't he cool?!
Here, hop on. I'll take ya wherever you wanna go!
Er, I'm actually okay right now. But thanks.
Anyway, that chariot is your partner, right?
You got it.
You ain't NEVER met a more powerful team. Here, watch—
Wait, Yuya! Please, hear me out.
Urk! Sorry, Slick.
I'm tellin' ya, we need to split 'em up.
N-no, you can't!
(Without my chariot, I'm...)
I mean... You wouldn't do that to me, right Slick?
Well...
Before we make any decisions, why don't you tell us more about it?
If Ranzal had a better idea of why it means so much to you, he might think twice about confiscating it.
Awright! Whaddya wanna know?
Well, how did you two meet?
I think what he means is who MADE it for ya?
I made him myself, of course.
Really?
Hell yeah! Took a bunch'a junk I found lyin' around—y'know, like broken shields and stuff—and slapped it all together.
Well dip me in ketchup and call me a hot dog. The kid's got talent!
Takes a fine pair'a hands to build somethin' like this.
Whatever. Bein' able to build stuff won't help me win any scraps.
The chief carpenter back home asked me to join his gang, but I turned him down.
I'm not out here to make stuff—I'm here to get STRONG!
So I made this chariot, see? 'Cause so long as I'm riding it, NO ONE can beat me!
Hmm... I think I'm starting to understand.
Yeah. Sounds like I better not take it off ya—for now.
Heh. Thanks, fellas!
I knew ya'd see it my way. 'Cause if ya didn't, it's the HIGHway! Ha ha!
That chariot really is the center of your world, huh?
They're a unique team, no doubt there.
I still don't get how it moves so fast, though.
Yes, I'm curious about that too. How do you achieve those speeds, Yuya?
It's simple, Slick.
You just grab the handlebars and kick, kick, KICK! WOOOOOO!
We're flyin' now, baby!
Wait, the speed is all him?!
Kid must never miss a leg day...
GRRRR!
YEAAAH! Let's pluck this turkey, chariot!
Hah! Didja see that, Slick? I sent that wimp flyin'!
So you did. Keep it up, Yuya.
Heh. Me and my chariot have GOT thi—wha?!
RAAAGH!
Holy mackerel... That's one big turkey!
You okay, Yuya?!
RAAAGH!
Urgh! He knocked me off my chariot! Gotta get back on...
RAAAAHHH!
Eeeeek!
Yuya! Are you okay?!
I... I'm scared... *sniffle*
Damn. Kid's totally rattled.
Sorry, Slick. Without my chariot, I can't...
Looks like it's just you and me, Euden! Haaaah!
Haaah!
Raaaagh?!
Jeez... You guys finished him in one hit?
It's not as impressive as it looked.
Yeah. That fiend was all bark.
No foolin'? Then I let a wimpy fiend scare me...?
Ugh... I'm the pits.
I haven't grown a lick since the time Red Champ saved my tail!
Who's Red Champ?
What, you've never heard of him? He's ginormous, and the strongest cat around!
Just lookin' in his eyes had me AND the fiends shakin' in our boots.
I have the same effect on buffets. Ha ha!
Well, whoever he is, he saved you from fiends. Is that right?
Yup. That's when I decided I wanted to become big and strong, just like him.
I even changed up my duds and combed my hair to match his!
Yer tellin' me other people dress like that too?
Oh, he looks aces. Big and red and FLASHY!
And man, that voice. Full'a fire, I'm tellin' ya!
All'a that in such a tiny body. I dunno how he does it!
Er, didn't you just say he was big?
He is! He's small, yet so big!
...You followin' this?
Not quite, but I can at least understand wanting to be like the person you admire.
I'm sure you'll be more like Red Champ one day, Yuya. Don't worry.
Heh! Thanks, Slick. Glad to know you've got my back.
And hey, maybe you can learn to be like him too!
I-I'm fine as I am, I think.
Wait—more fiends?!
They won't scare me this time. I'm gonna knock 'em flat!
COME'N GET IT, YA TURKEYS!
CLUCK CLU-KAAAAAW!
...Oh, it's just a chicken.
N-no...
Fiends I can understand, but are ya tellin' me yer afraid'a chickens, too?
I can't believe it... What're you DOIN' here, Red Champ?!
WHAT?!
No way. There's no way Red Champ is a damn chicken.
But Ranzal, look at his comb...
It DOES look a lot like Yuya.
Jeez, ya actually have a point. But hang on... If that's Red Champ, and Red Champ is his idol, then...his idol's a chicken?
If he saved Yuya from fiends, he must be quite strong.
Cluck CLUCK!
Oh man, peep those peepers... He is fired UP!
You're the coolest, Red Champ. Who'd ya beat up on the way here?
Cluck. Cluckity cluck.
Hm...
CLUCK! KA-KAAAAW CLUCK!
No kiddin'?! That's aces!
Um, what's he saying, Yuya?
No clue.
Cluck! CLUCKITY CLUCK!
Ha ha, you're the best, Red Champ!
And yet you keep up the conversation...
CLUCK CLUCK!
Er, Ranzal? What are you doing?
Shhh, lemme see what he says.
Seriously? Damn, that's the bee's knees!
Hah, he got it! Kid's full'a hidden talents. Cluckity cluck cluck!
CLUCK! CLUCK CLUCK!
Ha ha, I KNEW you guys'd get along!
Am I the weird one...?
Hah! Haaaah!
Jeez Slick, you're really swingin' for the fences!
How'd ya get that strong, anyway? Good ol' fashioned willpower, is it?
Heh. That's not far off, actually.
I've always had people I wanted to protect, and that's what made me want to get stronger.
In the end, that desire to protect others actually BECAME my strength.
You're losin' me.
Hm, maybe I wasn't clear enough.
Basically, I've come to realize that the secret to strength is to fight FOR someone.
You have people in your life that you want to protect, right?
Mm, not too sure about that.
Oh?
What about your parents? Don't you want to protect them?
Ah, well... I haven't seen 'em in a while. I left home after we got into this big scrap.
They tried to stop me from doin' my hair like this. Can you believe that?!
That sounds, er...very frustrating.
Still, I'm sure you'll understand eventually if you keep fighting.
You sayin' I gotta get in more scraps? Shoulda led with that, Slick!
Wait—
Can't get better at fightin' unless you fight MORE, right? Makes perfect sense!
I better get movin' so. COME AT ME, TURKEYS!
*sigh* That could have gone better.
I wonder... Does he try to act tough to hide the fear he holds deep down?
VROOM VROOOOOM!
CLUUUUUUUUUUUUUCK!
I'd know that cry anywhere!
CLUUUUUUUUUUUUUCK!
What's the haps, Red Champ? ...Wait, what's that?!
GRRRRR!
Yowch, that's one big turkey. You got this, Red Champ!
CLUCK?! CLUUUUCK!
There's that glare! You don't know what's comin', fiend—
GRARGH?! GRRRRRAAAAAAH!
Damn, he didn't even flinch... That's hardcore, man!
RAAAAGH!
Hah! That all you got, wimp? Red Champ didn't even FEEL that!
...Hold on, why isn't he dodging?
Tweet, tweet...
Wait, are those his kids?!
CLU-KAAAAAAAAW!
Damn... He's takin' every blow, just to protect his chicks!
In the end, that desire to protect others actually BECAME my strength.
I think I finally get it.
I feel the answer burnin' in my heart!
CLUCK CLUUUUUUUCK!
I've got your back, Red Champ. Whatever's important to you is important to me too!
So I'm gonna fight with you. Take THIS!
RRRRRGH!
Th-this fiend's pretty strong...
But I won't let myself be scared!
Eat this! Ka-POW!
Graaah!
Kaaaa-POW! KA-POW-POW-POW-POW-POW!
Let's wrap this up. EAT METAL, SCUMBAG! HIYA!
GRAAAAAAAAAAAH!
DAMN I'm strong! Ha ha ha!
You and the kids see that, Red Champ?!
CLUCK! CLUUUCK!
Tweet! Tweet!
Hell yeah! I'm straight aces!
With my chariot, and my will to protect people, nothin' can...
...Huh?
...No. No FRICKIN' way!
My chariot broke?!
(As long as I was riding my chariot, I felt invincible.)
(No fiend could take me on, no matter how strong!)
(He made me forget my fears...)
(We were together on the coldest of nights...)
(On the warmest of days...)
(We were inseparable. The perfect team!)
(And man, when we got goin', we were like the damn wind.)
(There was that time we rode to the next town over to try their famous bread... Still the best I've ever had!)
(Hell, we even FLEW together! I really shoulda seen that cliff...)
(But now...)
NOOOOOOOOOOOO!
Can I even fight without you, partner?!
I can't go back to my lame old self again... I can't!
What am I gonna do...?
Thank you for helping with the shopping, Yuya.
No sweat, sis! Gotta put my strength to use somehow.
...Not like I can fight anymore. I'm just a wuss without a partner now.
If you mean that chariot of yours, you needn't worry.
It is being repaired at the Halidom as we speak. I'm sure it will be back in working order before long.
Ya really think so?! Man, I can't wait to see my guy again.
I'm tellin ya, sis, when me'n him are together, there ain't NOTHIN' that can stop us!
Yuya, hush!
What is it, sis, ya don't believe me?
I am NOT your sis! Please, just get down and keep your voice low.
We can't let them spot us.
Who now?
The imperial soldiers marching this way.
I don't like these odds, sis. There's too many of 'em!
Indeed. And if we assume they are headed for the Halidom to mount a surprise attack...
I read ya loud'n clear. We gotta take 'em out here!
Did we not just agree that their numbers are too great?
If we hurry back ourselves, we can still warn everyone in time.
Though that's far from guaranteed...
Then we'll have wasted our chance! We gotta finish 'em here.
Come on, they can't beat me when I've got my chariot!
...But you DON'T have your chariot, do you?
...Shoot.
I fear retreat is our only option. We shall simply have to try our best to reach the castle before they do.
Come, Yuya. Let us hope we are not too late.
I gotta run away...?
What is the matter? We must hurry.
I know I'm nothin' without my chariot, but I seriously have to turn tail and run?
Sure, I'd just get killed if I got in a scrap right now, but...
Is this really all I've got? A lousy bet that we can make it back to Slick and them in time?!
Red Champ wouldn't run. And neither would Slick!
They'd stand their ground, put their lives on the line. That's what STRONG people do!
What you're planning is insane, Yuya! I won't allow it!
Don't worry sis—insanity's my bread'n butter.
Now beat feet back to Slick. I'll buy you some time!
It's gonna work. We can save everyone!
You truly believe you can hold them here? By yourself?
Hey, if my life can save everyone else's, that's a price worth payin'.
Yuya...
Very well. I shall follow your plan.
But you are to disrupt their ranks ONLY, and then retreat. Am I clear? You are not allowed to die.
Heh... Damn legs are shakin'...
I can't die here. I'm gonna live to get stronger.
All right. OVER HERE, TURKEYS!
What?! ...Oh, it's just a kid.
Oh yeah?!
Aaargh!
You ain't gettin' nowhere NEAR Slick's castle, you imperial scumbags!
Ah, a friend of Euden's, are you?
It was quite foolish to face us alone. Show him why, men!
Yes, sir!
You cats ain't got NOTHIN' on me!
Haaaah!
Urk! That one hurt... But I'll show you how tough I am!
Even WITHOUT my chariot!
Underestimate me at your own risk, freaks!
Urgh! How can someone so small be so strong?!
*pant* *pant* No one...bends my comb. OR my will!
And you can take that to the bank!
What a pest. Don't hold back, men— KILL HIM!
Yes, sir!
Urgh... You turkeys won't beat me. Not now, not EVER!
Ah! Damn it... My leg's givin' out on me.
Now! Finish him!
Yuya! Your chariot is fixed!
Argh!
No foolin'...?
Partner! You look better than ever.
Yuya! I'm so glad we made it in time.
Urgh... Wait—Euden?!
Blast! We wasted too much time on the child!
Sure did. Now take THIS! HAAAAH!
Aaaagh!
Ambushes don't feel so good, do they?
Slick! Sis! Ya made it!
It was only possible thanks to you.
Cleo told me everything. You were incredibly brave, Yuya!
Damn straight! Didn't know ya had that kinda courage in ya, kid!
And now you've got yer partner back; why don't you show us what yer made of?
Ha ha! Hell yeah.
With me'n my partner back together, my heart's about to get a hundred times stronger!
So don't blink, or you'll miss all the action!
Let's go, go, GOOOO!
Aaaaah!
Ka-POW! KA-POW KA-POW KA-POOOOW!
Wh-what IS this kid?!
Commander, he's decimating our formation! We can't take much more!
Ugh... Fine. RETREEEAT!
Ha HA! I'm the best, baddest, STRONGEST cat around!
I'm amazed you could keep fighting after sustaining such injuries.
Hold still. I'll heal you.
Thanks, sis!
*sigh* I must admit that is not my favorite moniker, but I suppose I can live with it.
Man... I frickin' DID IT!
I finally closed the gap between me and Slick and Red Champ!
And I owe it to all of you! Now let me go buy you some bread as thanks! Let's go, Chariot!
